Text_DidYouKnowAnswer: That people give more at the end of the service?
Error_WrongEmailOrPassword: Wrong e-mail address or password, please try again.
Text_Collectes_Subtitle: Select the date and the time of the offering to reveal the given amount.
Text_TransactionCost_MoreInfo: These costs are charged by SlimPay for the signed mandates and for handling the transactions. Signing a mandate costs €0.50. Givt will apply this cost on the first four times the donor uses Givt. This way the costs are evenly divided over the different situations in which Givt is used for donating.
Text_GivtServiceFee_MoreInfo: Givt charges this fee for providing the service.
Text_Stornos_MoreInfo:
Two types of costs are calculated in this fee (a plus b):
a the amount of money the user has retracted
b the fees that are charged by SlimPay for retracting money

Type 1 means the donor has retracted the money before it was withdrawn from his or her bank account or the transaction was declined by the bank or processor. Type 2 means the donor has retracted the gift after it was already withdrawn from his or her account or the donor's bank has rolled back the transaction. The retraction amounts and fees of type 2 will almost always be charged over the proceeds of an offering of a later date than the one on which the donor has given.
PW_EnterEmail: Enter your e-mail address. We will send you an e-mail with the information on how to change your password.
PW_UnknownEmail: Something went wrong. We can't find your e-mailaddress. Are you sure you've entered the correct one?
PW_SavedDashboardText: Your password has been saved, go back to the dashboard to log in.
PW_MakeAPassword: Enter a new password for your emailaddress.
PW_PWPolicy: The password should contain at least 7 characters including a capital and a digit.
PW_RequestedPW: Check your inbox to reset your password.
